segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing so precariously, and the stool is about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for him to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on the cookies, they don’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, but she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the floor is getting wetter by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this—I want to yell at them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s foot is barely on the stool, and he’s leaning too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes everything look so peaceful, but it’s anything but.
segments.speaker: PAR
